title: Unfair ban systems
body: so, i was ranking and i got dc'ed since my wifi was lagging out and i couldnt fix it, through out the whole game it shows that im lagging. would i still be at fault for dcing. i got 5 20 minutes queues from that 1 game that i left, not sure if its ranked and its more strict or something.

replies.body: Any kind of disconnect, regardless of the main reason behind it, can affect the other players in the game. Whether you d/c'd from a power outage or rage, the rest of your team was left to try and 4v5 without you. This is the main reason for the LPQ penalties, to protect others from AFK's
ok, i understand now, but would it be stricter if its a ranked game, cus im pretty sure i havent afk'ed or left the game in a while. maybe queue dodged but thats it, why would 1 game give me a LPQ.
No stricter punishments in ranked, but the systems may have been detecting afk's or dc's from earlier on in the year.
thats very drastic if it detected it from a few months or year ago. in game i might've afk'ed because of the lag i was getting unless you are talking about other afk games.
